reg_pit.title: Insurance Premium Tax Act Classes of Insurance Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 154/2016, effective June 13, 2016.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Insurance Premium Tax Act Classes of Insurance Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of the Insurance Premium Tax Act, accident and sickness insurance, aircraft insurance, automobile insurance, hail insurance, life insurance and marine insurance have the same meanings as in the Classes of Insurance Regulation under the Financial Institutions Act.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Insurance Premium Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 232, section 1 (2)]
